title: is there not @Priority annotation in NotFoundExceptionMapper.java  quarkus-resteasy-reactive
body:
### Describe the bug

I found there is @Priority annotation in NotFoundExceptionMapper.java  of quarkus-resteasy
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/33311503/161765505-326ac476-6557-4c26-8bff-66716948ee12.png)
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/33311503/161765655-1a0e2885-bc4a-4c77-a289-e7c033458b31.png)


but there is not @Priority annotation in NotFoundExceptionMapper.java  of quarkus-resteasy-reactive
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/33311503/161765759-7d4a56a3-3b86-4f63-81a0-64cb314e5f85.png)
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/33311503/161765841-743d3087-5bd2-4b04-a531-c76febb4b7cf.png)


is @Priority annotation not  necessary in quarkus-resteasy-reactive 
when I used ExceptionMapper<Exception> to process NotFoundException
I can not catch the exception

### Expected behavior

_No response_

_No response_
